analyzed: gaṇeśa stotram
kharvam sthūlataram gaja indra vadanam lamba udaram sundaram
vidhna īśam madhu gandha lubdha madhupa vyālola gaṇḍa sthalam
danta udghāṭa vidārita āhita janam sindūra śobhā karam
vande śailasutā sutam gaṇapatim siddhi pradam kāma dam
dehi me sukha sampadam
eka dantam mahā kāyam lamba udaram gaja ānanam
sarva siddhi pradātāram gaṅgāputram namāmi aham
vande tam gaṇanātham āryam anagham dāridraya dāva analam
śuṇḍā daṇḍa vidhūyamāna śamalam saṃsāra sindhoḥ tarim

original: yaṃ natvā surakoṭayaḥ prabhuvaraṃ siddhiṃ labhante parāṃ
analyzed: yam natvā sura koṭayaḥ prabhu varam siddhim labhante parām
sindūra arūṇa vigraham paripatat dāna ambu dhārā hṛtam
uccais brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa dvitaya sahacaram kumbha yugmam dadhānaḥ
preṣat nāgāri pakṣa pratibhaṭa vikaṭa śrotra tāla abhirāmaḥ
devaḥ śambhoḥ apatyam bhujaga pati tanu sparddhi vardhiṣṇu hasta
s trailokya āścarya mūrtiḥ jayati trijagatām īśvaraḥ kuñjara āsyaḥ
gaṇapatiḥ ca herambaḥ vidhna rājaḥ vināyakaḥ
mahodaraḥ mahākāyaḥ ca ekadantaḥ gajānanaḥ

original: akṣamālāṃ ca dantaṃ ca gṛhṇan vai dakṣiṇe kare |
analyzed: akṣamālām ca dantam ca gṛhṇan vai dakṣiṇe kare
paraśum modaka pātram ca vāma haste vidhārayan
nānā puṣpa rataḥ devaḥ nānā gandha anulepanaḥ
deva asura manuṣyāṇām siddha gandharva vanditam
trailokya vidhna hartāram ākhu ārūḍham namāmi aham
sumukhaḥ ca ekadantaḥ ca kapilaḥ gajakarṇakaḥ
lambodaraḥ ca vikaṭaḥ vidhnarājaḥ vināyakaḥ
ṣoḍaśa etāni nāmāni yaḥ paṭhet śuṇuyāt api

original: vidyārambhe vivāhe ca praveśe nirgame tathā || 13 ||
analyzed: vidyā ārambhe vivāhe ca praveśe nirgame tathā

original: saṃgrāme saṃkaṭe caiva vidhnastasya na jāyate |
analyzed: saṃgrāme saṃkaṭe ca eva vidhnaḥ tasya na jāyate
vidhnavallī kuṭhārāya gaṇādhipataye namaḥ
śrī gaṇeśa stotram samāptam
